languages.text: {n}На губах мужчины возникает бледная снисходительная улыбка.{/n} "Он давно уже прерван, брат".
{n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."
languages.original_text: {n}На губах мужчины возникает бледная снисходительная улыбка.{/n} "Он давно уже прерван, брат".

traits.locale_text: {n}A pale condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago, my brother."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}少し見下すような笑みが男の唇を飾る。{/n}「それは大昔に断ち切られた」
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: {n}少し見下すような笑みが男の唇を飾る。{/n}「それは大昔に断ち切られた」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}这个人的嘴角流露出无力而屈尊纡贵的微笑。{/n}“它在很久之前就终止了。”
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人的嘴角流露出无力而屈尊纡贵的微笑。{/n}“它在很久之前就终止了。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Voilà bien longtemps qu'il a été interrompu, » {n}rétorque l'homme, un sourire pâle et condescendant aux lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien longtemps qu'il a été interrompu, » {n}rétorque l'homme, un sourire pâle et condescendant aux lèvres.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre esboza una sonrisa desdeñosa.{/n} «Ya hace tiempo que se interrumpió».
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre esboza una sonrisa desdeñosa.{/n} «Ya hace tiempo que se interrumpió».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Ein blasses, herablassendes Lächeln ziert die Lippen des Mannes.{/n} "Er wurde schon vor langer Zeit unterbrochen."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein blasses, herablassendes Lächeln ziert die Lippen des Mannes.{/n} "Er wurde schon vor langer Zeit unterbrochen."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Adamın dudaklarına solgun, küçümseyici bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n} "Süreği uzun zaman önce bozuldu."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan, condescending smile graces the man's lips.{/n} "It was discontinued a long time ago."
